I don't know what morei is, I'm afraid.

My scanner has under a heading titled advanced a feature called Descreen which is essential for several types of images.   
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Gordon Robson 
  To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, August 06, 2003 1:09 AM
  Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: Scanning


  Hi all,

  I'm looking for a little free advice on scanning. I am using a 
  Canoscan9900F, which is a very good scanner. I begin my scans through 
  Photoshop 7.0 into ScanGear CS. I have been using very high dpis of 
  1600 and 800 with the weak morei (spelling?) turned on and the sharp 
  turned off. I am still getting nasty looking morei in my scans of 
  oshigata for this summer's lecture. Any ideas on what I need to do to 
  improve my scans?

  Gordon
